casebody.data:
POSTUM COMPANY, Inc., et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Joseph T. HIGGINS, as Collector, etc., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 311. Circuit Court of Appeals, ‘Second Circuit. Feb. 10, 1936. Dawes, Abbott & Littlefield, of New York City (Hamilton M. Dawes, Lester E. Waterbury, Oscar McPeak, and George S. Herr, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. John Davidson, of New York City, for appellees.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed in open court.
